post.description: OAuth2 compatible token login, get an access token for future requests
Test access token
Password Recovery
Reset password
HTML Content for Password Recovery
Create new user.

get.description: Get current user with plan information.

post.description:
Create new user without the need to be logged in.

A verification email will be sent to the user's email address.
Verify user email with token from verification email.
Resend verification email.

get.description: Get a specific user by id.

post.description: Send SMS (Single or Bulk). Messages are queued if no devices are online.
Callback for Android device to report received SMS
Register new device
Callback for Android device to report SMS sending status (ACK)
Update device FCM token using API Key

put.description:
Upgrade to a new plan.

- Free plans: activates immediately
- Paid plans with invoice: returns payment URL for manual payment
- Paid plans with authorization: returns authorization URL for automatic payments

Payment method defaults to 'invoice'. Set payment_method='authorized' for
automatic recurring payments (requires provider authorization).

post.description:
Cancel subscription.

By default, cancels at end of current billing period.
Set immediate=true to cancel immediately (no refund).
Create/configure webhook
Generate a new API key for integrations

get.description: List all API keys for the current user

post.description: Revoke an API key (deactivate without deleting)

get.description: List available OAuth providers and their status.

Get OAuth authorization URL for the specified provider.

The client should redirect the user to this URL to start the OAuth flow.

Handle OAuth callback from provider.

Exchanges the authorization code for tokens and redirects to frontend.

post.description:
Link an OAuth account to an existing user by verifying their password.

This is used when a user with an existing password-based account
tries to login with OAuth for the first time. The frontend should
call this after the user enters their password.

delete.description:
Unlink an OAuth account from the current user.

User must have either a password or another OAuth account to unlink.

get.description: List OAuth accounts linked to the current user.

post.description:
Set a password for an OAuth-only user.

This allows OAuth users to also login with email/password.

get.description:
Generic webhook endpoint for payment providers.

Supports:
- QvaPay authorize_payments callback (GET with query params)
- QvaPay invoice webhook (POST with JSON)
- Future providers (TropiPay, etc.)

Args:
    provider: Payment provider name (qvapay, tropipay)

post.description:
Generic webhook endpoint for payment providers.

Supports:
- QvaPay authorize_payments callback (GET with query params)
- QvaPay invoice webhook (POST with JSON)
- Future providers (TropiPay, etc.)

Args:
    provider: Payment provider name (qvapay, tropipay)

Check for expiring subscriptions and process automatic renewals.

Called daily by QStash Schedule.

Process a queued notification from QStash.

On success: returns 200, message delivered to FCM.
On failure: returns 500, QStash retries. After retries exhausted, goes to DLQ.
Create a new user.
